--- Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:

> Azureblade: Arghhh!!! Can't.... go... on.... got... me.... this...
> time!
> 
> He had to escape. He was not going to make it as is. Whatever those
> things were, they were too strong for him to resist for long. He did
> the only thing he thought possible...
> 
> His body suddenly went limp. There was no more energy into it. It
> fell
> face first on the moon's surface, raising a growing cloud of dust
> where it did.

With a click the spheres detach themselves from the seemingly inert
form of Azureblade and hover in the air as if momentarily unsure of
what to do ...

Preston
(da'minion)
